question:
You need to ensure that phone-based poling data can be analyzed in the PollingData database.How should you configure Azure Data Factory?
A.Use a tumbling schedule trigger
B.Use an event-based trigger
C.Use a schedule trigger
D.Use manual execution
description: When creating a schedule trigger, you specify a schedule (start date, recurrence, end date etc.) for the trigger, and associate with a Data Factory pipeline.Scenario:All data migration processes must use Azure Data FactoryAll data migrations must run automatically during non-business hoursReferences:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/how-to-create-schedule-triggerQuestion Set 1
